about_me.title: About me
about_me.line1: Curious, passionate about programming and solving problems, I spend my free time doing technology watch and building my personal projects.
about_me.line2: After an IT degree at the <1>Reims "Institut universitaire de technologie"</1>, I graduated a computer science engineering diploma at the <3>Cnam</3>.
about_me.line3: I worked at <1>Un-zéro-un</1> part-time, a digital agency located in Charleville-Mézières. I then went on to work at <3>Spacefoot</3> in the e-commerce team, focusing on building the internal tool and integrating with the various marketplaces.

your_company.title: Your company
your_company.line1: I'm currently looking for a job. Let's build something cool together !

mpi.title: MP Integrator
mpi.line1: While at <1>Spacefoot</1>, most of my work was around this tool.
mpi.line2: It is used to synchronize offers on multiple marketplace and facilitate product creation among other things.

deal_and_co.title: Deal&Co
deal_and_co.line1: During my part-type at <1>Un-zéro-un</1>, I worked on the API for our Deal&Co client.
deal_and_co.line2: This mobile app lets you find discounts, gifts, ... with the partners around you.

gescicca.title: Gescicc@
gescicca.line1: Developed by the <1>Lab'S DN</1> at the <3>Cnam</3>, Gescicc@ is the student management tool on which I worked during my first two years of part-time.
gescicca.line2: It solves every use-case a Cnam center can have and is used by every one of them in the world.

cotemeuse.title: Côté-Meuse
cotemeuse.line1: After my internship, I worked one more month at Un-zéro-un. I had the chance to work on the Côté-Meuse marketplace.

prowty.title: Prowty
prowty.line1: Not available yet, this project is a platform to plan events with friends.
prowty.line2: The goal of it is to centralize every aspect you want when preparing a party, a trip or anything.
prowty.line3: Money repartition, tasks to do, sharing pictures of the trips, etc...

metaprint.title: Metaprint
metaprint.line1: Simple tool to print out info about your computer (Ram usage, CPU temperature, ...), useful for i3 and tmux.
metaprint.line2: I wanted to have a simple yet configurable tool to take care of this, that could also handle multiple computers without any external dependencies.

cao.title: Cards Against Overflow
cao.line1: Cards Against Humanity is an open-source card game, similar to Blanc Manger Coco or Limite Limite.
cao.line2: This version lets you play with your friends online.
cao.line3: For legal reasons, the cards are not given but a JSON format lets you easily import your decks.
cao.line4: A new version in React was started but it's still WIP.

tpbt.title: TwitchPlaysBlindTest
tpbt.line1: This software was designed to be hosted and used as a SaaS by streamers wanting to create blind-tests.
tpbt.line2: A score system and a leaderboard was implemented, everything being automated through the Twitch API.
tpbt.line3: Originally created for the JosetteLaChèvre streamer, it unfortunately did not end up used.

snapdesk.title: SnapDesk
snapdesk.line1: One of the first thing I ever programmed.
snapdesk.line2: SnapDesk was a Snapchat client for the desktop, built in Java.
snapdesk.line3: Everything was functional, though since the huge restrictions added by <1>Snap Inc.</1> on their API at the beggining of 2014, it was not feasible to continue this project.

contact.title: Contact
contact.line1_l4j: Did I peak your interest? I'm looking for a job, contact me!
